qas.question: What was the first type of connection used by the iPod to charge and transfer files?
What was an alternate method of charging the iPod?
What type of connector was originally required to upload songs or recharge the iPod?

context: Originally, a <a0_0><a2_0>FireWire<a2_0/><a0_0/> connection to the host computer was used to update songs or recharge the battery. The battery could also be charged with a <a1_0>power adapter<a1_0/> that was included with the first four generations.
